reviews.review: I Hawkeye, would highly recommend this game even though I am a noob.

A game that anyone can anjoy litterly. You just need to know what you can do. Like surfing is one of my favorits. And also matchmaking. Lots of uppdates and content, And its free :) so just download it. It'll be worth it
Great game to play with a small group of friends, community can be toxic at times but overall fun and enjoyable if you have enough money to get prime, if not then dont bother
Very good game if you wanna learn ruski blyat

If you're russian and you're reading this, please don't play CS:GO on your computer. Go play CS:GO outside
Best fps game in the long time
My teamate kept on screaming that last enemy was gargalon... where is gargalon (it was dust 2) btw his gamertag was Robin.

Counter strike used to have a vibrant community server list. Valve lost sight of the community content makers that made Counter Strike the phenomenom that it became. All they care about now is lootboxes and "ranked matchmaking". If you browse community servers (which is hidden away by the way) you see 100's of shitty russian mirror servers that effectively drown out legit servers. 

Valve. Do something. Give me my money back. I didn't pay for this shit F2P version of the game.
